products.title: Marcella Chocolate
products.description: Min width: 300mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 100% polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.

products.title: Delicious Cappuccino (6513)
products.description: Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice. Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects. Flexible and stepless positioning. Interchangeable fabrics. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.

products.title: Fagel Coffee
